name: Product Manager
description:
NovaKid invites an Experienced Product Manager to join our team at Novakidschool.com an online-school of English for children aged 4-12. Our customers come from more than 30 countries all over the world. We have 50K+ students and 2K+ teachers. Our international team is proud of 400+ developers / support managers and marketing gurus. Novakid is showing 5x annual growth.

Responsibilities:

  • Formulate product improvements / features to achieve business goals, maintain relevant parts of Product Roadmap,

  • Design, execute and evaluate A/B tests,

  • Work with engineering team to plan and implement these improvements according to the Product Roadmap;

  • Manage Agile process with the engineering team,

  • Manage product analytics, define essential metrics, track performance and iterate on product based on insights from this data,

  • Work with other departments to coordinate and support roll-out of new features,

  • Gather & process product ideas within the organization.

Qualifications:

  • 4+ years experience in product management

  • 4+ years building, delivering, and supporting mobile and/or web applications (mobile preferred)

  • Excellent spoken and written English. Advanced spoken Russian (desirable),

  • Strong technical background (ideally started career as a software engineer),

  • Experience as Product Manager on a notable international consumer product,

  • Guru at product stat, metrics and A/B testing (Excel black belt, good knowledge of GA / GO / etc),

  • Notable professional achievements (be ready to share cases of your projects),

  • Proven experience in agile methodology. Experienced with agile planning, development and communication management tools: JIRA, Slack and similar

  • Experienced working as part of a distributed & remote team

  • Strong analytical skills

  • Results-oriented and mission driven

We offer:

  • Any location - remote work;

  • Full-time employment;

  • Flexible working hours, 40+ hours per week;

  • Friendly young team;

  • Interesting and promising project, looking forward to meeting you!

  • Bonuses and option programs are available.
